description: A Lua injector which embeds code into a LÃ–VE 2d game at runtime.
notes: Copy/Symlink the version.dll present in the lovely-injector/current directory to the game directory of the game you are planning to mod using lovely-injector.
Then put the mods you are trying to use into the mod directory, which is not the same as the game directory.
If you are modding Balatro, this directory is %AppData%\Balatro\Mods
More information on the installation/usage of lovely-injector can be found at the homepage
